title: Hey Riot, Camille looks absolutely bad ass. So, i was wondering
body: Could you tell me something about her? Lore, personality, abilities, anything. 1 piece of information about her. Im far too impatient to wait for her release to learn more about her, and am dying to know anything about the new blade-legged beauty. much thanks rito ~

replies.body: I suspect she'll most likely be be doing physical damage as there aren't enough AD Assassins in league, with Zed and Talon being the only true ones.
be patient young grasshopper and let the hype and speculation build. From her comic i know one of her ability is a hook that you can move around
i will bet she likes to kick stuff too
